name: Tehran
description:
The game is about the afterlife of a soldier called Abdo that came back from death and his responsibility is to save the planet from aliens and defend people. After he came back to life the world is completely different and he thought that hundred years past that time.

After he released the aliens because the aliens caused this to the earth he started to build an army to defeat them.

The story takes place in a city that is destroyed by aliens and the main character is soldier called Abdo that is back from death and he is with special equipment that makes him stay alive. The story take place in 3050 that we have many new technology and word is on  improved technology era, the responsibility of the Abdo is to save the planet and kill all foreign enemies.
